EmailTemplate.description: Email Template for Password Expiring Notification
EmailTemplate.name: PasswordExpiringNotification
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Password is About to Expire
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Password is About to Expire
Dear {!Portal_Honeywell_ID__c.Contact__c},
Your online security is important to us, therefore a new password must be created every twelve months. Please click on the following link to sign in and change your password.
http://cwa.honeywell.com/profile/activatePassword.do?&act=UI&activationKey=3d4caebc29b5045550338305180cc8ad
Note:
This email is being sent from an unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International Choose Option 7 (Web Support)
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
